item.title: Javascript Event 찾는곳 MDN
item.author: Author
item.description: javasdcript event 종류를 알고 싶다면 MDN https://developer.mozilla.org/ko/docs/Web/Events 1 2 3 4 5 function functionName() { consloe.log("event!!"); } window.addEventListener("eventName", functionName); 자주 사용하게 되는 이벤트 window.addEventListener("EventName", functionName) resize mouseEnter mouseleave
